title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB:
When following the steps in 1GEWMOZ:
1. Create a new basic project
2. Create a new file named test.xml
3. The scripted resource editor example opens on XML files by default
4. Select test.xml in the Navigator
5. Choose 'Open With...' / 'Default Text Editor'

Observed Behavior:
- Nothing happens; the scripted resource editor example remains active and the XML file is not opened in the Default Text Editor
EB:
Expected Behavior:
- When selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' for the test.xml file, a new editor should open for the file, using the Default Text Editor. This should happen even when the file is already open in a different type of editor.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a new basic project
2. Create a new file named test.xml
3. Open the scripted resource editor example
4. Select test.xml in the Navigator
5. Choose 'Open With...' / 'Default Text Editor'

Notes:
- Searching for an existing open file should also consider the editor types
